description:
### VolleyballPositions

In a normal game of volleyball there are always exactly six players playing. So the positions are numbered as follows:

Players rotate position as follows: 1-2-3-4-5-6-1-2-3-4-5-6-1....
Find the initial position for each player after K rotations have been made.
Given the initial configuration of players and the number of rotations K, return an array representing the positions of players.

Input: Takes an array of string arrays representing the initial formation and an integer K representing the number of rotations.

Output: An array of string arrays representing the final configuration after K rotations.

Example:

```js volleyballPositions([['empty','Player5','empty'], ['Player4','empty','Player2'], ['empty','Player3','empty'], ['Player6','empty','Player1']], 2) // [['empty','Player1','empty'], ['Player2','empty','Player3'], ['empty','Player4','empty'], ['Player5','empty','Player6']] ```
